title: Business Analyst (SAFe)- Remote
description:
Req ID: 313851

NTT DATA strives to hire exceptional, innovative and passionate individuals who want to grow with us. If you want to be part of an inclusive, adaptable, and forward-thinking organization, apply now.

We are currently seeking a Business Analyst (SAFe)- Remote to join our team in Remote, Karnātaka (IN-KA), India (IN).

Business Analyst (SAFe)- Remote

How You’ll Help Us

As a Business Analyst, you’ll support our clients by identifying, analyzing, and implementing efficient business solutions. You’ll work directly with a collaborative project team and client stakeholders to design, develop, and enhance processes and systems, ensuring each solution is optimized for success. If you’re passionate about business analysis, technology, and problem-solving, this role offers an ideal growth opportunity.

How We Will Help You

At NTT DATA, we see this position as more than just a job. With opportunities for certifications, professional development, and continuous training, we are committed to your long-term growth. We prioritize work-life balance and provide the flexibility you need to thrive.

Why The Role Is Important

As a Business Analyst, you play a key role in bridging technology and business needs, aligning IT systems with client goals. Your insights and strategies drive improvements that maximize efficiency, enhance functionality, and create value for stakeholders. By guiding less experienced team members, you’ll also contribute to the overall growth and strength of the team.

Once You Are Here, You Will

Requirements Gathering and Analysis


Lead workshops and stakeholder interviews to capture business and functional requirements.
Document objectives, goals, and success criteria to drive project roadmaps.
Prioritize and manage requirements, ensuring alignment with business needs and addressing scope adjustments as needed.


Process Improvement and Documentation


Conduct gap analyses to identify inefficiencies and opportunities for improvement.
Create detailed user stories, use case diagrams, and acceptance criteria.
Develop business analysis plans, contributing to the overall project strategy and documentation.


Collaboration and Stakeholder Engagement


Collaborate with clients and technical teams to assess systems and support new implementations.
Partner with stakeholders at all levels to support business case development for new initiatives.
Maintain open communication and provide regular updates to stakeholders and project teams.


Project and Team Management


Participate in agile & SAFe ceremonies and collaborate with other analysts. Will need to coordinate across teams.
Ensure transparent communication across project phases, providing regular status updates and insights.


Basic Qualifications


8+ years in a Business Analyst role, with experience in complex software applications and strong business-to-technology translation skills.
Demonstrated leadership skills, strategic insight, and attention to detail.
Versatile in both Agile and Waterfall project methods, able to navigate challenging situations effectively.
Competent with SAFe framework.


Preferred Skills


Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field.
Experience with Microsoft applications like Visio, Project, and tools like SQL, Power BI.
. Experience as RTE in SAFe framework.


Ideal Mindset


Team Player: You help others succeed and enjoy collaboration.
Problem Solver: Analytical with a client-first approach, always seeking improvement.
Proactive Learner: Dedicated to personal and professional growth.
Organized: Able to manage complex information and present it effectively.
Confident Communicator: Able to speak up respectfully, especially with critical insights.


Please note Shift Timing Requirement: 1:30pm IST -10:30 pm IST
